text: Na'ankure Saioni kumamoka kagri knare zanku hu'na nagira hamunki'na omani kea huvava nehu'na, Jerusalemi kumamoka knare zankura akohe'na omanigahue. Ana hu'na nevanugeno nanterampi zage hanatino remsa hiaza huno, fatgo avu'avazamo'a kagripintira remsa nehanigeno, agu'mavazi zamo'a kenage tavi tagi karugaru huno nevigeno remsa hiaza huno remsa hugahie.
